name: Time Force
description:
TIME FORCE  is  is a nonsensical hop, skip, and trip through time! The world is in peril and you brave heroes are tasked with traveling back in time to steer humanity away from the apocalypse. 

Slip, crash, and stumble through the epic set pieces of history, meet notable figures, and fight for a better tomorrow!

Designed as a one-shot for 2-6 players, 2+ hours with a GM. Inspired by 90's Sci Fi like Stargate SG-1, Quantum Leap, and Star Trek. 

Save the World! Change the Past! Time Force!
